title: Hospitality Practical Competency Strengthening: Mobile-Based Language Education Design Project Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete a mobile-optimized language education design project within one week
Learners can improve their instructional design drafts at least twice by incorporating peer feedback
Learners can analyze exemplary cases published on online platforms and apply at least three strategies to their own projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
